Text: All of the scenebalance d/l's have been great -- I just wish they wouldn't put the "[scenebalance]" plug at the beginning of their torrents.  I download a lot of TV and their self-plug makes their stuff hard to find.  No issues with getting your name out there, but how about putting it at the end of the filename?  I'm getting my stuff elsewhere because of this.

All that and I have to tell everyone what episode this is?  

It is the Deflate You Mate episode.
